subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] edison used smoke to modulate beam
author: Ken Thomas
full_text:
--0-1597069214-1176473341=:29252
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

edison's heir (grand niece) who, like edison, was a virulent nazi and near-ignoramus (and you can be sure i will catch some harrassment from the estate for posting this) paid millions to eradicate evidence of edisons real activities--to , in effect, "change the past".
   
  you would have to get that copy of mx illustrated, which should be no problem in NYC.  there isnt much on the ensuing pages, only that the experiment was a bust.  

Amy Raiola <SIParanormalSociety@...> wrote:
              Do you have the rest of this article or do you know where it can be found?
   
  Thanks,
  Amy
   
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Ken Thomas 
  To: evp-itc 
  Sent: Thursday, April 12, 2007 9:03 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] edison used smoke to modulate beam
  

    im listening to my short-circuit receiver using mrf 901.  it can be adjusted to scan around on the uhf tv channels.  no ghosts though (yet)
